verses.text: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* choirmaster. \w To|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tune \w of|strong="H5921"\w* “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lily \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Covenant.” \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Miktam \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* instruction. \w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* fought Aram-naharaim \w and|strong="H1732"\w* Aram-zobah, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* Joab returned \w and|strong="H1732"\w* struck \w down|strong="H5921"\w* 12,000 Edomites \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Valley \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Salt. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* rejected \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* broken \w us|strong="H5921"\w*; \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* been angry; restore \w us|strong="H5921"\w*!

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H8147"\w* shaken \w the|strong="H5221"\w* land \w and|strong="H7725"\w* torn \w it|strong="H7725"\w* open. Heal \w its|strong="H7725"\w* fractures, \w for|strong="H8147"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* is quaking.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* have shown \w Your|strong="H7725"\w* people hardship; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* are staggered \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* wine \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w made|strong="H6555"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* drink.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* raised \w a|strong="H3068"\w* banner \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* may flee \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bow. Selah

Respond \w and|strong="H5971"\w* save \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* right hand, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* beloved \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* delivered.

\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5414"\w* spoken \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* sanctuary: “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* triumph! \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* parcel \w out|strong="H5414"\w* Shechem \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w apportion|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Valley \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Succoth.

Gilead \w is|strong="H3225"\w* Mine, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Manasseh \w is|strong="H3225"\w* Mine; Ephraim \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w My|strong="H3467"\w* helmet, Judah \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w My|strong="H3467"\w* scepter.
Moab \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H1696"\w* washbasin; upon Edom I toss \w My|strong="H1696"\w* sandal; over Philistia I shout \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w triumph|strong="H5937"\w*.”

\w Who|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* bring me \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H4519"\w* fortified city? \w Who|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w lead|strong="H7218"\w* me \w to|strong="H3063"\w* Edom?

\w Have|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* not rejected \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God? \w Will|strong="H4124"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* no longer march \w out|strong="H7993"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* armies?
Give us aid \w against|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* enemy, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* help \w of|strong="H5892"\w* man \w is|strong="H4310"\w* worthless.

\w With|strong="H3318"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* perform \w with|strong="H3318"\w* valor, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* trample \w our|strong="H3318"\w* enemies.
